person.persName: Richard "Dick" Rowan Bolling (Kentucky attorney and court clerk)

body.p: Kentucky attorney and court clerk. Married to Mary “Eddy” Scott. Studied law in Harrodsburg, Kentucky, and was admitted to the bar. Member of the Democratic Party and Union Party. Doorkeeper for the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1854. Assistant county and circuit clerk of Boyle County Court. Clerk of the Boyle County Court in 1856. Delegate to the 1856 Democratic Presidential Convention that nominated James Buchanan. Unsuccessful candidate as a Douglas Democrat for the clerk of the Court of Appeals of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1861. Deputy clerk of the Court of Appeals of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1856 to 1866. Served as clerk of the Court of Appeals of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1856 for a short time following the death of Rankin R. Revill.
